fields.label: Cards
fields.name: hero_cards
fields.instructions: These will appear on the left side of the hero in a carousel.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of the card.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of the card. Please keep headlines as short as possible, as the card is only able to grow to a certain extend, and the text may get cut off.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear underneath the headline. Please keep paragraphs as short as possible, as the card is only able to grow to a certain extend, and the text may get cut off.

sub_fields.label: Stat 1 Number
sub_fields.name: stat_1_number
sub_fields.instructions: Include any special characters, such as $ or %.

sub_fields.label: Stat 2 Number
sub_fields.name: stat_2_number
sub_fields.instructions: Include any special characters, such as $ or %.

sub_fields.label: Coordinates
sub_fields.name: coordinates
sub_fields.instructions: Select the spot that the map should center upon.

sub_fields.label: Animation Duration
sub_fields.name: animation_duration
sub_fields.instructions: The amount of time it will take to transition to this point on the map.

fields.label: Cards
fields.name: community_spotlight_story_slider
fields.instructions: Select and order cards to feature.

fields.label: Headline
fields.name: ventures_headline
fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of this section.

fields.label: Paragraph
fields.name: ventures_paragraph
fields.instructions: This will appear underneath the headline for this section.

fields.label: Featured Ventures
fields.name: ventures_featured_ventures
fields.instructions: Select and order the ventures (which are blog posts with the category "Venture") to feature on this page.

fields.label: Basic Stats
fields.name: ventures_basic_stats
fields.instructions: These stats will appear to the right of the featured ventures.

fields.label: Headline
fields.name: highlighted_reports_headline
fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of this section.

fields.label: Paragraph
fields.name: highlighted_reports_paragraph
fields.instructions: This will appear underneath the headline at the top of this section.

fields.label: Top Industries Module
fields.name: highlighted_reports_top_industries
fields.instructions: This module will appear at the top left of the highlighted reports section.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of the module

sub_fields.label: Column 2 Value
sub_fields.name: column_2_value
sub_fields.instructions: Either a positive or negative number.

sub_fields.label: Column 3 Value
sub_fields.name: column_3_value
sub_fields.instructions: Either a positive or negative number

sub_fields.label: Footnote
sub_fields.name: footnote
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the bottom of the module in small text.

fields.label: Downloads Module
fields.name: highlighted_reports_downloads
fields.instructions: This module will appear on the bottom left of this section.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of this module.

fields.label: Top Needs Module
fields.name: highlighted_reports_top_needs
fields.instructions: This module will appear on the bottom right of this section.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear at the top of this module.

fields.label: Testimonial Post
fields.name: testimonial_post
fields.instructions: This will pull various content from the associated Testimonial (Post)
